935254129101991937.text:
Why is gold valuable?
• It’s durable
• It’s portable
• It’s divisible (weight, length of wire)
• It’s fungible
• Limited supply
So, why is #bitcoin valuable? 
All of above AND:
• Transferable over the Internet
• Programmable
• Easy to verify
